title: Gameday mode- general behavior
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is watching a game in the mlbtv player

NOTE:
Gameday will not appear in the app on the first launch after installation or after clearing data. It is turned on by a config that does not register the first time. To test Gameday, the app needs to be launched, closed (possibly force closed and possibly closed more than once) and then gameday will be available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the controls are visible on the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a "Gameday" quick actions button is present above the scrubber bar next to the "CC" button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the Gameday button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the player will transition to Gameday mode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the player is in Gameday mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the player controls are disabled

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the player is in Gameday mode
AND the user hits the back button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the player transitions back to playing the game in fullscreen mode

title: Launch Gameday Loading UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Gameday Mode
custom_expected:
THEN the screen will enter Gameday mode
AND the loading UI includes Strikezone image
AND the loading UI includes Pitch Number Circle
AND the loading UI includes Count
AND the loading UI includes MPH/Spin Rate/Break UI
AND the loading UI includesEmpty Placeholder for the Pitch Feed section
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13474365)

title: Strike Zone
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game in Gameday mode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes the strikezone
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the strike zone based on the pitcher’s view

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a pitch occurs 
AND the pitch is a strike
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a strike renders as red in the strikezone using ball/strike coordinates

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an atbat is occurring
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN all pitches within the at bat should be rendered
AND z-indexed as the latest pitch in front

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a pitch occurs 
AND the pitch is a ball
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the ball renders as green in the strikezone using ball/strike coordinates

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a pitch occurs 
AND the ball is hit into play
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN pitch in play renders as blue in the strikezone using ball/strike coordinates

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a new at bat begins
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN then clear the previous at bat pitches

title: Most Recent Pitch
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game in Gameday mode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the most recent pitch data is available
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the pitch data will be presented in the most recent pitch section
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13475538)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the most recent pitch data is available
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the pitch data will be presented
AND  ball/strike/in play is included
AND pitch type is included
AND count is included
AND pitch speed is included,
AND rotation is included
AND break is included

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user observes the most recent pitch info
AND the play is a STRIKE
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the pitch will be represented by a RED indicator

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user observes the most recent pitch info
AND the play is a BALL
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the pitch will be represented by a GREEN indicator

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user observes the most recent pitch info
AND the play is a IN PLAY
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the pitch will be represented by a BLUE indicator

title: Most Recent Pitch-In Play
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game in Gameday mode

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN there is a play result (strikeout, walk, in play)
AND the play is over
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display the play result

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN there is a play result (strikeout, walk, in play)
AND the play is not over
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN display the pitch description
(EXAMPLE: the pitch is still displayed when homerun occurs until the play result is final so that the state is not spoiling the outcome of the play)

title: Pitch Feed- Previous Pitches- Non-Play events
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game in Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN previous pitch events are available
AND the events are non-play events
custom_expected:
THEN pitch data is displayed for the pitch 
AND pitch number is displayed (Integer)
AND pitch result is displayed by color (ball=green, strike=red, in-play=blue)
AND pitch result is displayed (examples: Called strike, foul, etc.)
AND pitch speed is displayed
AND pitch type is displayed (examples: fastballm, four-seam fastball, slider, etc.)

title: Pitch Feed- Previous pitches- Play events
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game in Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN previous pitch events are available
AND the event is a play event
custom_expected:
THEN the pitch card displays batter headshot with team primary color background
AND the pitch card displays play result with font in play result color (examples: STRIKEOUT in red, GROUNDOUT in blue, HIT BY PITCH in green, etc.)
AND the pitch card displays the play description  (Examples: "Nick Senzel strikes out swinging", "TJ Friedl grounds out, second baseman Brandon Lowe to first baseman Yande Diaz", "Jonathan India hit by pitch", etc.)

title: Pitch Feed- actions as new pitch data becomes availble
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game in Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN pitch data is available for most recent pitch
AND new data becomes available so that a new pitch is now most recent
custom_expected:
THEN the new pitch will occupy the most recent spot
AND the previous pitch will display in the tile just to the right of the most recent pitch
AND other previous pitches will also shift to the right, maintaining their order

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13475539)

title: Gameday button only shows for games with correct gamedayType

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user plays a game with supported Gameday type (E, P) (This will be true for almost all regular season games)
AND the controls are activated on the screen via the remote
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Gameday button will be displayed as a quick action button next to the CC button
AND selecting the button will enter the user into Gameday mode

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user plays a game with un-supported Gameday type (Y,D,N,L,B,S) (Exhibition game NEU @ BOS on 2/23/2024 is one example)
AND the controls are activated on the screen via the remote
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Gameday button will not be displayed on the screen

title: Show outs for In Play results
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game in Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the most recent play is IN PLAY (blue icon)
AND the play results in an out
custom_expected:
THEN the out should display in blue once the play is final
Example: In Play transitions to Groundout curveball after the out is made and the play is final

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13475586)

title: Pitcher Batter Matchups -Live Games
custom_preconds: GIVEN user watching a LIVE game in Gameday mode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN data becomes available for a pitcher batter matchup
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the pitcher's name, position, number, and picture should display
AND the batter's name, position, number, and picture should display

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user watches live
AND continues to watch into a subsequent inning
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the pitcher batter matchups will continue to display and match with the pitchers and batters in the inning

title: Error handling
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game in Gameday mode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a player failure occurs
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN exit gameday mode 
AND just show the video playback failure

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Gameday response fails for 60 seconds :question_mark:
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN render a failure to load message
AND display an exit button
